title: having an issue with qeue
body: hi I'm am a league of legends user and I left one game last night because I got tired it was three in the morning and now I cant join a game with out a 5 minute penalty coming up so I cant play with friends because after I wait if I leave the qeue it starts over and when I go to join another game same thing happened a 5 min penalty comes up and ive waited my 5 min penalty when I logged on this morning and it hasn't went away at all its still their how do I fix this problem

replies.body: Leaving a game, no matter what time it is, will  get you hit with a Leaverbuster. When you leave a game you're leaving the team you queue up with at a disadvantage. Which makes the game pretty unfun :( If you work through that queue though then you shouldn't have to worry about another Leaverbuster again.
so do I just have to keep playing games and it will eventually go away
